ValidationRule.description: Cannot move to New, Resolved, Closed from Vendorhold
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR ( AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support',ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Resolved'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Vendor Hold')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support',ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Vendor Hold')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support',ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Vendor Hold'))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please move status to 'In Progress'. You can't change the status to 'New', 'Resolved' or 'Closed'.
